name: Anima Fighters
description:
Created for AET339 System Design under the College of Fine Arts in the University of Texas at Austin.

From Team [will edit later] comes beastly combat down to its bare essentials. Play as 1 of 4 unlockable characters against your friends and see how you fare when your only options are fight or flight. As you bare your fangs, you'll charge your Ferocity meter - fill it to unleash your fury! 

This game is local 2-Player only! Both players must use the same keyboard to battle.

Controls

Player 1:

Z - flight (move back)

X - fight (attack, lunging forward; hold to charge further distances)

C - ferocity attack (special attack, deals more damage)

Player 2:

N - fight (attack, lunging forward; hold to charge further distances)

M - flight (move back)

B - ferocity attack (special attack, deals more damage)
